item.description:
We will be joining Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on an exciting group tour to Italy!

Join the club on a group tour September 18 - 25, 2010 to Italy! Explore the beauty of Tuscany and the splendor of Rome on this popular 8 day group tour to Italy. Join us as we explore the wonders of Florence, visit San Gimignano and participate in a fun cooking demostration, enjoy wine tasting in the Chianti region, and witness the amazing history of Rome and the Vatican. This is a great group tour for those who wish to see Italy with a group of fun, like-minded adventurers.

Price: $1,975 pp plus international flight
(NO Single Supplement charge unless you specifically request a single room to yourself)

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

(NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip)

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Demand for this trip is very high and space is limited. Be sure to get your spot early, as spaces will go very quickly!

Included in this awesome adventure:
* Expert English speaking local guides
* Global Expeditions Club Leader
* Transportation and tours as indicated in modern a/c vehicle
* Fully guided tour to San Gimignano with an Italian cooking demonstration
* Wine tasting in the Chianti Region
* Guided tour of Florence
* Guided tour of Rome, the Vatican and Sistine Chapel
* 7 breakfasts, 1 lunch and 1 dinner
* 7 nights hotel in excellent 3-4 star hotels

Places Visited: Florence Italy, Tuscany, San Gimignano, Chianti, Castello Verrazzano, Rome, Vatican, Sistine Chapel, St. Peter's Basilica, the Coliseum, Roman Forum, Piazza Navona, Pantheon, Trevi Fountain, Spanish Steps

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This tour is being organized by The Global Expeditions Club. For more information, visit our website or contact us at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

Make Friends. Travel the WorldÂ®
item.name: Italy: A Group Tour of Rome & Tuscany - 8 Days
